faq.find_answers: Find answers to the most common questions about our learning platform.
faq.cancel_subscription_q: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
faq.cancel_subscription_a: Yes, you can cancel at any time without justification. Your courses remain accessible until the end of the paid period.
faq.use_credits_q: How can I use my institution's training credits?
faq.use_credits_a: Your organization's administrator can assign your credits via the management space. These credits allow access to certified programs or premium options.
faq.subscription_options_a: We offer three plans: Student (basic access), Premium (all courses + certification), and Institutional (multi-learner management).
faq.data_security_q: What security measures protect my data?
faq.data_security_a: We use AES-256 encryption and are GDPR certified. Payments are secured via PCI DSS Level 1.
faq.access_purchased_course_q: How do I access a course I purchased?
faq.access_purchased_course_a: All your courses appear in your personal space. You will also receive a confirmation email with direct access.
faq.modify_license_q: Can I change my license type later?
faq.modify_license_a: Yes, any license modification applies a pro-rata. Our team can provide a personalized simulation.

features.learning_description: Interactive pedagogy, personalized tracking, and recognized certifications - everything for your academic and professional success.
features.unlimited_access_description: Keep lifetime access to all your courses and updated resources, even after certification.
features.multimedia_content_description: Interactive videos, self-correcting quizzes, and 3D simulations for an optimal learning experience.
features.certification_description: RNCP-accredited diploma + career support with our network of 500+ partner companies.
features.community_description: Collaborative space with themed forums, working groups, and live events with experts.
features.resources_description: Complete learning kit: PDF materials, reusable templates, and industry case studies.
features.mentorship_description: 2 sessions per month with a dedicated tutor + personalized feedback on your assignments.
community.trusted_by: More than 250,000 professionals and students trust us for their skill development
faq_title: Frequently Asked Questions about our Learning Platform
faq_subtitle: Find answers to your questions about courses, certifications, and learning methods.
faq_question_1: Can I access the courses after cancellation?
faq_answer_1: Yes, you retain access to previously acquired educational resources. New course updates require re-registration. Progress tracking remains available for 1 year.
faq_question_2: How to use my institution's training credits?
faq_answer_2: Your administrator can allocate credits via the management space. These credits provide access to certified programs and premium options according to the agreement with your institution.
faq_answer_3: We offer 3 plans: Student (basic access), Professional (all courses + certification), and Institutional. Installment payments are available, and we accept CPF/OPCO funding.
faq_question_4: How is my learning data protected?
faq_answer_4: We use AES-256 encryption and are GDPR certified. Results and work are never shared without explicit consent.
faq_question_5: How to access a purchased training?
faq_answer_5: All your training will appear in your personal space once payment is confirmed. You will also receive an email with direct access and a user guide.
faq_question_6: Can I change my subscription plan?
faq_answer_6: Yes, any changes will apply a prorated cost. Our online simulator allows you to estimate the remaining cost before final validation.
